description: L-Cystine should not be confused with cysteine, from which it is derived. Cystine is an oxidized dimer form of the amino acid, cysteine, that is common in many foods such as eggs, meat, dairy products, and whole grains. L-Cystine is a semi-essential amino acid because it is found in food sources. This amino acid, L-Cystine, plays a role in protein synthesis, supports heart health, and fortify the lungs.* In addition, L-Cystine plays a key role with the protein, collagen, which makes it useful for supporting hair, nails and skin health.* And, this amino acid supplement may also aid focus and contribute to a calm sense of well-being.* In addition, this amino acid may also have antioxidant properties that protects the cells against free radical damage.* Cystine may also support and fortify immune system.* Due to being a building block for glutathione, L-Cystine may also support skin cells against free radical damage which may help promote skin health.* Our L-Cystine, which is in powder form, does not contain any fillers, additives and artificial flavors. Not only that it's filler free, our Cystine powder is dairy free, soy free, gluten free and especially no added sugars.
